title: Masters of Science in Computer Science
description: Focused on advanced topics including Machine Learning, Advanced Project Management, Advanced Algorithms, and Cybersecurity. The program emphasizes both theoretical and practical skills through coursework in algorithm design, software engineering, and system architecture. It equips students with the expertise needed to solve complex computing problems and manage large-scale technology projects.

title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, focusing on software development, algorithms, and system design. The program includes courses in programming, data structures, computer architecture, and software engineering
